channel.title: Remove leading zero from hour section
channel.description: Hi. I'm using the template tag [[time|%I:%M%p]], but I'd like to be able to remove the leading zero from the hour section. How do I do that? Thank you.

item.title: Remove leading zero from hour section
item.dc:creator: glor
item.description:
The p is on the end. It’s %p.

item.title: Remove leading zero from hour section
item.dc:creator: drdrang
item.description:
And if you need to eliminate the leading space character that [[time|%l:%M%p]] gives you, put a hyphen (think of it as a minus sign) in front of the l: [[time|%-l:%M%p]].
